trans-unit.source: Represents an individual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column header.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader"></xref> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can click this column header to sort the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> by the associated column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.CanUserSort*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> associated with this column header.
The column associated with this column header.
Gets the key that references the style for displaying column headers during a header drag operation.
The style key for floating column headers.
Gets the key that references the style for the drop location indicator during a header drag operation.
The style key for the drop location indicator.
Gets the display position of the column associated with this column header relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
The display position of associated column relative to the other columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.DisplayIndex*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the column associated with this column header is prevented from scrolling horizontally.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated column is prevented from scrolling horizontally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.IsFrozen*> dependency property.
To be added.
Builds the visual tree for the column header when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event and initiates sorting.
This method is called when the header is clicked.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this column header.
A new automation peer for this column header.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> routed event that occurs when this control is no longer receiving mouse event messages.
The event data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture> event.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this control.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this control.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
The event data.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> used to paint the column header separator lines.
The brush used to paint column header separator lines.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the user interface (UI) visibility of the column header separator lines.
The UI visibility of the column header separator lines.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SeparatorVisibility*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> is sorted by the associated column and whether the column values are in ascending or descending order.
The sort direction of the column or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if unsorted.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader.SortDirection*> dependency property.
To be added.
